question: There are 50 second-graders at Pine Valley School. 30 of them are girls. On Friday, 8 second-grade girls and 5 second-grade boys were absent. How many second grade boys were at Pine Valley School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 50 second graders, 30 are girls, so 50 students - 30 girls = <<50-30=20>>20 boys.
On Friday there were 20 boys - 5 absent = <<20-5=15>>15 boys.
#### 15
